com.mindfusion.scheduling.model

Class Reminder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Reminder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Reminder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents reminders associated with schedule items.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Duration MaxInterval
      The maximum time interval that can be set as value of Reminder.setTimeInterval(com.mindfusion.common.Duration) for a Reminder object.

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                   XmlSerializationContext context)
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Saves the reminder data to an XML document.
        Parameters:
        element - Allows adding data to the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

      • loadFrom

        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Loads reminder data from an XML document.
        Parameters:
        element - Allows reading data from the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

      • getTimeInterval

        public Duration getTimeInterval()
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Gets how much time before the item's scheduled start time to raise the event that triggers the reminder.

        This value is considered only if Reminder.getType() is Leading.

        Returns:
        A Duration instance specifying how much time before event's scheduled time to trigger the reminder.

      • setTimeInterval

        public void setTimeInterval(Duration value)
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Sets how much time before the item's scheduled start time to raise the event that triggers the reminder.

        This value is considered only if Reminder.getType() is Leading.

        Parameters:
        value - A Duration instance specifying how much time before event's scheduled time to trigger the reminder.

      • getTime

        public DateTime getTime()
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Gets the exact time when to trigger the reminder.

        The value of this property is considered only if the Type of the reminder is set to Exact.

        Returns:
        A DateTime object specifying when the reminder should be triggered.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(DateTime value)
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Sets the exact time when to trigger the reminder.

        The value of this property is considered only if the Type of the reminder is set to Exact.

        Parameters:
        value - A DateTime object specifying when the reminder should be triggered.

      • getPlaySound

        public boolean getPlaySound()
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Gets a value indicating whether to play a sound when the reminder is triggered.

        The path to the sound file can be set in the SoundFileName property.

        Returns:
        true to play the sound file; otherwise, false.

      • setPlaySound

        public void setPlaySound(boolean value)
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Sets a value indicating whether to play a sound when the reminder is triggered.

        The path to the sound file can be set in the SoundFileName property.

        Parameters:
        value - true to play the sound file; otherwise, false.

      • getSoundFileName

        public java.lang.String getSoundFileName()
        Description copied from class: Reminder
        Gets the name of a sound file to play with this reminder.
        Returns:
        A string specifying which file to play.
